ygData.subject: Research above Lev. 29 for wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok,  I ve spent a lot of time researching this whole research thing.  If you look at the list of researchable spells on http://www.mythiran.com/ and compare
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I've spent a lot of time "researching" this whole research thing. If
you look at the list of researchable spells on http://www.mythiran.com/ and
compare this to the spell list at stratics you will find that the only two
spells that are research only are the two level 16 area affect spells Pillar
of Fire and Project Lightning. Hardly worth the hundreds of plat players
are spending on runes. The list at stratics only goes to lev. 29. Do any
of you high level wizards know if research EVER becomes useful? Also, are
the rumors true about secret spell books? (other than the known 4)

Jeannot Lev 22 WIZ <Societus Argenti>
Karana Server
